job_title: Digital Marketing Assistant in London, England
pros: It's a great, emotive cause that you can get behind.
cons: Senior management are liars and middle management can get away with pinning failures on you and lying to you. There's a lack of transparency in their processes,  it trails behind in innovation compared to other charities and they have unrealistic expectations on their progression.

review_title: Definition of gas lighting! Avoid for your own health.
pros: Great cause and that’s about it.
cons: Degrading bullying culture, if you need to know what gas lighting is work here. They will make your life hell.
